name: @ne1410s/dom
description: Lightweight ES5 script designed for inclusion in html and svg to simplify DOM operations

scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.publish-patch: npm run clean-build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-minor: npm run clean-build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-major: npm run clean-build && npm version major && npm publish --access public

author: ne1410s <pgj646@gmail.com> (http://ne1410s.co.uk)
